actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Federal Energy Office to prescribe regulations to assure that the owners of abandoned gas stations take certain safety measures.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of the Federal Energy Office to prescribe regulations which require owners or operators of gas stations permanently ceasing operations to prevent risks to the public from gasoline storage facilities.

titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Federal Energy Office to prescribe regulations to assure that the owners of abandoned gas stations take certain safety measures.
